channel.title: Some problems with lights (open/closed) on doors
channel.description:
Hi,
Some problems with lights that show if the door is closed or open...
[b]First one:[/b]
Where those scientist comes banging on the window and those security agent is grabbed, in those room. (those with a Health and power recharge station in front of it)
The room with those big closing doors, where u need to break the glass.
So when u finally hit this room, there is a scientist in it, when u look to the door u just came through, it stays on green, but cannot be opened, so this color has to be changed to red.
-----------------------------------------
[b]Second one:[/b]
In blast pit, u need to turn the knows so the red becomes green and the doors open, but on some of them, u can turn them, even if they stay red and the door stays locked (gameplay wise).
I think it's better u cannot turn them at all or something
